## DocumentResource.getBody() method

Retrieves the document in the original or PDF version.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getBody(packageId: string, documentId: string, option?: Requests.GetDocumentBodyOption): Promise<Responses.Response>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packageId | string | Package ID |
|  documentId | string | Document ID |
|  option | Requests.[GetDocumentBodyOption](./onespan-sign-node.getdocumentbodyoption.md) | (Optional) Option to specify the format and parameters to retrieve the document. Defaults to original format |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Responses.Response&gt;

Document body

REST API documentation (OneSpan): - [Retrieve document in original format](https://community.onespan.com/products/onespan-sign/sandbox#/Documents/api.packages._packageId.documents._documentId.original.get)

- [Retrieve document in PDF format](https://community.onespan.com/products/onespan-sign/sandbox#/Documents/api.packages._packageId.documents._documentId.pdf.get)
